snippet: The struggling apparel retailer said it was laying off about 3,700 full- and part-time employees and closing 338 stores.
abstract: Wet Seal will shutter 338 stores and lay off 3,700 employees, both full- and part-time; retailer has been struggling for last five quarters.
lead_paragraph: The struggling apparel retailer said it was laying off about 3,700 full- and part-time employees and closing 338 stores.

headline.main: Wet Seal Lays Off Employees and Closes Stores in Droves
headline.print_headline: Wet Seal Lays Off Employees and Closes Stores in Droves
